thread.title: Nicola Roberts congratulates Cheryl and Liam Payne on baby son's birth (and gives Mother's Day shout out to Kimberley Walsh as well)
thread.title_full: Nicola Roberts congratulates Cheryl and Liam Payne on baby son's birth (and gives Mother's Day shout out to Kimberley Walsh as well)

author: Lara Martin
title: Nicola Roberts congratulates Cheryl and Liam Payne on baby son's birth (and gives Mother's Day shout out to Kimberley Walsh as well)
text:
Nicola has congratulated Cheryl and Liam (Photo: Getty/Rex) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Nicola Roberts has joined her Girls Aloud bandmate Nadine Coyle in sending congratulations to Cheryl and Liam Payne on the birth of their child. 
Popstar Nicola described the newborn’s arrival as “heaven” when she left a message on BFF Cheryl’s Instagram post announcing the birth of her first child with Liam. 
Underneath Cheryl's heartfelt and beautiful statement about her son's birth, Nicola left a string of love heart emojis with the message: “Heaven. Love you so much. [To the moon] and back.” Nicola and Cheryl are very close friends (Photo: Getty) The post announcing Cheryl and Liam's son (Photo: cherylofficial/Instagram) 
She then shared a lovely Mother’s Day message for both Cheryl and fellow Girls Aloud bandmate Kimberley Walsh, who is mum to sons Bobby and Cole. 
"Happy Mother's Day my 2/3rds @cherylofficial & @kimberleywalshofficial," wrote Nicola. 
"Remember how we used to wonder what it would be like when we were older and the kids started coming... [love] you both and love so much that there's little bubbas here now." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
